description: Turn Alexa into a veritable muse with the Promptly skill. Just ask for the current prompt, the previous week's prompt, or a random prompt, and Alexa will use Promptly to get an appropriate response from the renown writer's resource, WritersDigest.com.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Promptly for the current prompt
Alexa ask Promptly to get last week's writing prompt
Alexa, tell Promptly to prompt me
name: Promptly
shortDescription: Jump start your creativity with weekly writing prompts
